title: EC60080: Laser Technology - Quick Facts
text:
EC60080
Course name | Laser Technology
Offered by | Electronics & Electrical Communication Engineering
Credits | 4
L-T-P | 3-1-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Pre-requisites: NoneMonochromaticity, directionality, laser speckle, polarization, coherence, active medium, laser pumping, optical resonator, ruby, Nd-YAG lasers, gas and semiconductor lasers, modes, gain oscillation, power output, threshold, single mode operation, Q-switching, mode locking, instabilities, laser fabrication, laser applications in communication, industries, etc
